sentences.en: A good jackknife is often of service to a camper.
sentences.cn: 一把折刀对于露营人很有用.

sentences.en: A pocket knife is a handy tool for any camper or hiker.
sentences.cn: 口袋型的刀子是喜欢野营和健行的人一项便利的工具.

sentences.en: Dorms can course cost less than of camper's off - campus housing but school own.
sentences.cn: 宿舍可以花费比不是大学住房的要少.

sentences.en: I have such friend, therefore I am in the world the most camper.
sentences.cn: 我有这样的朋友, 所以我是世界上最快乐的人.

sentences.en: Ideal for cleaning your boat, deck, car, pets, sports cleats, hiking boots, camper and more!
sentences.cn: 能非常理想的清洁你的船, 甲板, 汽车, 宠物, 运动鞋, 登山鞋, 野营和更多东西!

sentences.en: Mr. A is always a happy camper regardless of the challenge.
sentences.cn: 尽管面对挑战,A先生还是知足常乐.

sentences.en: Ms. Squires used the money to buy a VW camper.
sentences.cn: 斯奎尔斯用这笔钱买了一辆大众野营车.

sentences.en: My fellow campers were already packing up their tents.
sentences.cn: 我的露营同伴已经在收起他们的帐篷了。

sentences.en: PACK The camper had cooking equipment in his pack.
sentences.cn: 那露营者的背包里有烹饪装备.

sentences.en: The camper had cooking equipment in his pack.
sentences.cn: 那露营者的背包里有烹饪工具.

sentences.en: The camper had started perfectly at least 50 times that trip.
sentences.cn: 野营车在那次旅途中已经顺利启动至少50次了.

sentences.en: The camper lashed two pieces of wood together to make a bed.
sentences.cn: 露营者把两块木头捆在一起做成一张床.

sentences.en: Two Frenchmen were standing on the sand beside their camper van.
sentences.cn: 两个法国人站在他们的旅行车厢旁边的沙地上.

sentences.en: What would make you a happy camper?
sentences.cn: 什么能让你成为一个快乐的露营者？

words.tran_cn: 露营；扎营；临时安顿（camp的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: 露营者，野营者，（装有露营设备的）露营车，房车
trans.tran_en: someone who is staying in a tent or shelter
